model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I marked the boundary line with a pen on the wall so that we can both be clear about where my property ends and your property begins.
Oh, okay. I didn't realize there was any confusion about that.
Well, I just wanted to make sure we're on the same page. I don't want any misunderstandings in the future.
I understand. Is there anything else we should do to make sure we're clear about this?
I don't think so, but if you have any other suggestions, I'm open to hearing them.
No, I think the line is a good idea. It's clear and simple.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Feeling Overwhelmed and Seeking Support', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A expresses feeling overwhelmed and seeks support from Neighbors B.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Neighbors B, I wanted to talk to you about something that's been bothering me lately. ### Neighbors B: Of course, what's going on? ### Neighbors A: I've been feeling really overwhelmed and stressed lately. I feel like I have so much on my plate and I don't know how to manage it all. ### Neighbors B: I'm sorry to hear that. Is there anything I can do to help? ### Neighbors A: I would really appreciate it if you could be more supportive. Maybe just check in on me more often and see how I'm doing. ### Neighbors B: Absolutely, I'm here for you. Is there anything specific that's been causing you the most stress? ### Neighbors A: Well, my job has been really demanding lately. I was promoted to manager a few months ago and I'm still trying to adjust to the new responsibilities. ### Neighbors B: That can definitely be tough. But remember, you're capable of handling it. ### Neighbors A: Thank you for saying that. I also try to work out every morning to relieve some stress, but even that has become difficult to maintain lately. ### Neighbors B: Maybe we can work out together sometime and make it more enjoyable for both of us. ### Neighbors A: That's a great idea! Thank you so much for being understanding and supportive.' }
```
